DOC.brief_title: Educational Brochure Preparing Patients With Gastric Cancer Their Caregivers Recovery After Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To pilot test educational intervention form teach brochure prepare patient informal caregiver recovery follow partial total gastrectomy . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To describe preliminary effect intervention patient-reported outcome ( PROs ) , informal caregiver-reported outcome , clinical/system outcome . OUTLINE : Participants enrol sequentially 1 2 cohort . COHORT I : Participants receive standard post-operative care . COHORT II : Participants receive 2-page educational brochure surgery prior discharge home . After completion study , participant follow approximately 2 month .
